title: Wooden font - who knows where to find it
content:
Hi everybody,

Long long time ago we used this font to make our logo.  
Through time we lost the font and the logo has deteriorated.

Now i am desperatly searching for this font to remake the logo.

Anyone?

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018083309/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_112.jpg) | 6.78 KB |
author: Sir Arnoud

comments.content:
Your search is over!  
"Character" digitized this famous example of 19th century fancy font design in 2011 as [Rustic Black Shadow](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018083309/http:/abfonts.freehostia.com/rustic-black-shadow.htm). No copyright problems.  
Don
